Name: Explosive Device
Describe: Blows up the Space Resources being captured

Name: Energy Drink
Describe: The speed of the ongoing capture increases to 2x
TipsTxt: The speed of the ongoing capture increases to 2x

Name: Disruptor
Describe: The next capture will not detonate Explosive Devices
TipsTxt: This grip will not trigger the bomb

Name: The Midas Touch
Describe: Space Resources being captured will be converted to Gold Meteorites of the same size
TipsTxt: Capturing resources to turn into Gold Meteorites

Name: Metallurgy Guide
Describe: Gold Meteorites grant 50% more Resource Points in the next stage

Name: Extraction Guide
Describe: Star Gems grant 50% more Resource Points in the next stage

Name: Workout Guide
Describe: The speed of the next capture increases by 30%

Name: Lucky Guide
Describe: Forgotten Supplies grant 50% more Resource Points in the next stage

Name: A Guide to Catnip and Cats
Describe: Resource Points earned from the cat in the next stage increase by 50%

Name: The Container of Sands of Time
Meteor Destroyer
Describe: Blow up all the Space Meteorites in the stage

Name: Gravity Controller
Describe: All Space Resources' weight reduces by 70% for 10s

Name: Pulverizing Railgun
Describe: Turn all Space Meteorites in a line into Star Gems. The UFO can move when you use this item.
